entity.lilwings.interactions.error.full_: You already have a butterfly in your net!
book.lilwings.butterfly.aponi: 这种蝴蝶原生于$(#a67c3f)大型针叶林$()。它能被$(#a67c3f)棕色蘑菇$()引诱。将它放进罐子中，阿波尼蝶会不时地将$(#a67c3f)红色蘑菇转换为棕色蘑菇。$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.buttergold: 这种蝴蝶仅能在 $(#e6b800)向日葵平原$()中找到。玩家可以用$(#e6b800)蒲公英$()引诱它们。将它放入罐子中，$(#e6b800)它能将装有牛奶的炼药锅转化为黄油$()， 变成一个黄油块。黄油金蝶的翅膀可以用来制作$(#e6b800)小块黄油$()。
book.lilwings.butterfly.cloudypuff: 这种蝴蝶仅能在$(#f5d016)草原$()中找到。自然条件下，它可以用桶装$(#f5d016)云雾泡芙果冻。$()玩家可以通过放置$(#f5d016)营火$()来引诱它。将其放入罐子中，它会不断生成 $(#f5d016)云雾$()。
book.lilwings.butterfly.cloudypuff.wings: The wings of the Cloudypuff can be used to replace $(#f5d016)ghast tears$() in crafting recipes
book.lilwings.butterfly.cloudypuff.butte: 它们采集花蜜来分泌泡芙果冻，同时会产生云雾。
book.lilwings.butterfly.crystalpuff: 这种蝴蝶仅能在 $(#af19ff)繁花森林$()中找到。玩家可以使用 $(#af19ff)丁香$() 引诱它。 将它放进罐子中，它能$(#af19ff)使水晶生长更快$()。 水晶泡芙蝶的翅膀可以用于制作$(#af19ff)蝴蝶钻石$()。
book.lilwings.butterfly.enderfly: 这种蝴蝶仅能在 $(#009480)末地高岛$()中找到。 在自然中，如果你试图捕捉到它，它将会从捕蝶网中传送逃走。 玩家可以使用 $(#009480)紫颂花$()来引诱它。 将它放进罐子中，它会使靠近的玩家 $(#009480)传送开$()。 末影之翼蝶的翅膀可以像 $(#009480)末影珍珠$()一样使用。
book.lilwings.butterfly.goldapplefly: It turns out the red applefly can be turned into a $(#e6b800)gold applefly$() by putting a red applefly in a jar ontop of a golden block. A player does not need to lure $(#e6b800)the gold applefly towards them as the gold apple fly will always try to follow the player$(). When in a bottle, the golden applefly will provide $(#e6b800)buffed potion effects to nearby players.$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.grayling: This butterfly can only be found deep underground inside of $(#777777)lush caves$(). A player can lure the grayling towards them using $(#777777)moss$(). When put into a bottle, the Greyling will occationally $(#777777)make azeala’s bloom around it.$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.grayling.wings_c: The wings of the grayling can be fermented, after which they can be used as replacement for golden carrots.
book.lilwings.butterfly.grayling.butterf: This butterfly has the ability to change the color of its skin when its on top of blocks found in lush caves
book.lilwings.butterfly.paintedpanther: This butterfly can only be found in $(l)jungle forests$(). A player can lure the painted panther towards them using $(l)cocoa beans$(). When put into a bottle, the painted panther will turn cocao beans into crimson cocao beans. $(br)Note: Crimson cocoa beans look slightly crimson, hence their name.
book.lilwings.butterfly.paintedpanther.w: The wings of the painted panther can be eaten, but poison you. the natural poison could explain the unique flavour of crimson cocao beans.
book.lilwings.butterfly.paintedpanther.b: The eyes of the painted panther seem to have night vision
book.lilwings.butterfly.redapplefly: This butterfly can only be found in Oak forests. A player can lure the red applefly using $(#dd0000)apples, red dye, or poppies.$() Holding redstone scares them away. $(br)When put into a bottle, the red applefly appears to do nothing, but it seems to like being placed ontop of a gold block. $(br)The wings of the red applefly can be $(#dd0000)eaten$(), and replenishes as much hunger as an apple
book.lilwings.butterfly.shroomskipper: This butterfly can only be found on the $(#DD0000)rare mushroom islands$(). A player can lure the Shroom Skipper towards them using $(#DD0000)red mushrooms$(). When put into a bottle, the Shroom Skipper will occationally $(#DD0000)turn brown to red mushrooms around it.$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.shroomskipper.wi: The wings of the shroom skipper can be used as $(#DD0000)replacement for red mushrooms$() in mushroom soup
book.lilwings.butterfly.shroomskipper.bu: The anatomy of this butterfly suggests its a part of the fungus itself
book.lilwings.butterfly.swallowtail: This butterfly can only be found around $(l)villages$(). A player can lure the swallowtail towards them by holding $(l)seeds$(). When put into a bottle, the swallowtail will $(l)make surrounding crops grow faster.$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.swamphopper: This butterfly can only be found in the $(#1288ff)swamps$(). A player can lure the swamphopper towards them by holding a $(#1288ff)blue orchid$(). When put into a bottle, the swamphopper will $(#1288ff)pickup nearby items and deposit it into any inventory below it$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.swamphopper.wing: The wings of the Swamphopper can be converted to $(#1288ff)lapis lazuli$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.swamphopper.butt: The blue wing color gives the swamphopper $(#1288ff)camouflage$() over the watery surfaces
book.lilwings.butterfly.whitefox: This butterfly can only be found on $(#00d5e0)the highest frozen peaks$(). A player can lure the White fox towards them using $(#00d5e0)Lily of the valley$(). When put into a bottle, the white fox will occationally spawn $(#00d5e0)patches of snow$() around it.
book.lilwings.butterfly.whitefox.wings_c: The wings of the White fox butterfly have the same brewing capabilities as $(#00d5e0)sugar.$()
book.lilwings.butterfly.whitefox.butterf: The soft, snowy wings of the butterfly leave snowflakes in its trail.
advancements.lilwings.butter.title: 我不能相信它不是黄油。
advancements.lilwings.butter.description: 从黄油金色蝴蝶上获取黄油
